author: John
title: Kiev, a Russian ship destroyed in the Black Sea: “It was carrying Iranian drones”
text:
The Ukrainian Armed Forces launched a missile attack on the port of Feodosia, in Crimea annexed by Moscow; and the Kiev government announced that, in the operation, the Novocherkassk landing ship, used by the Russians to carry the Iranian-made Shahed kamikaze drones used to strike Ukraine, was destroyed. The Russian Defense Ministry admitted only that the ship was damaged and that President Vladimir Putin was immediately informed of the “damage”. The videos revealed images of explosions and smoke rising in the port area. According to the pro-Russian governor, six buildings were damaged during the bombing, damage mostly created by the shock wave. The attack, according to the Ukrainian military, was carried out by cruise missiles at around 02:30 local time.
Russia annexed Crimea in 2014 in violation of international law; and the Ukrainian government has repeatedly stated that it wants to retake the Black Sea peninsula. Since then, Ukraine has repeatedly attacked military targets in Crimea and in April 2022 sank the flagship of the Russian Black Sea Fleet, the Moskva.
According to the Russian Defense Ministry, Ukraine used air-launched missiles to attack Feodosia. The Novocherkassk, built in Poland and entered into service in the late 1980s, is designed for amphibious landings and can carry various types of armored vehicles, including tanks. According to Kiev, the attack was probably carried out using Storm Shadow missiles supplied by Britain or France. The spokesman for the Ukrainian Armed Forces Air Force, Yuriy Ihnat, denied the news given by Moscow according to which, in the battle, the Russian army shot down two Ukrainian planes; However, he claimed that the Ukrainian intelligence services participated in the operation. Meanwhile, pro-Russian authorities in Crimea have threatened to prosecute eyewitnesses who released photos and videos of the fire in the port. «Hostilities are ongoing, from time to time the enemy strikes Crimea. There are raids and successes. However, this is definitely not a reason to jump onto balconies in your underwear, shoot a video and post it online. In this way, you work for the enemy, you do the work of his intelligence,” said Oleg Kryuchkov, advisor to the head of the pro-Russian administration. All those who posted videos with footage of the raid – he added – have already been identified, “the work of the special services is underway”.
The attack is an undoubted success for Kiev’s strategy which aims to keep the Russian fleet off the Ukrainian coast. But this is nevertheless Kiev’s only major military success this year, because after several notable Russian steps backwards in 2022, the front line has remained almost unchanged and in recent weeks Moscow’s troops have further increased pressure on the eastern fronts and southern.
The Ukrainian Armed Forces launched a missile attack on the port of Feodosia, in Crimea annexed by Moscow; and the Kiev government announced that, in the operation, the Novocherkassk landing ship, used by the Russians to carry the Iranian-made Shahed kamikaze drones used to strike Ukraine, was destroyed. The Russian Defense Ministry admitted only that the ship was damaged and that President Vladimir Putin was immediately informed of the “damage”. The videos revealed images of explosions and smoke rising in the port area. According to the pro-Russian governor, six buildings were damaged during the bombing, damage mostly created by the shock wave. The attack, according to the Ukrainian military, was carried out by cruise missiles at around 02:30 local time.

author: NTN24
title: Kamala Harris es favorecida por dos encuestas en uno de los estados clave para ganar la presidencia de Estados Unidos | NTN24.COM
text: [Elecciones en Estados Unidos](/temas/elecciones-en-estados-unidos) Kamala Harris es favorecida por dos encuestas en uno de los estados clave para ganar la presidencia de Estados Unidos Los analistas aseguran que de concretarse esta favorabilidad, la candidata demócrata seguramente será la próxima mandataria de EE. UU. Luego de días de espera, dos prestigiosas encuestadoras estadounidenses entregan pistas sobre el efecto del debate presidencial en uno de los estados claves, Pensilvania. Este estado es considerado la madre de todas las batallas y las cifras entregadas entre el miércoles y este jueves son alentadoras para Kamala Harris. La encuesta de Quinnipiac le da a la candidata demócrata un 51% de favorecimiento contra un 46% de Donald Trump, mientras que la elaboradas por el New York Times y Sienna tiene a Harris con un 50% de aceptación y al republicano con 46%. Esto ocurre mientras los candidatos continúan sus actividades de campaña, esta vez con la inmigración y la herencia hispana como foco de atención.

author: Canal 26
title: El 21 de septiembre vuelve FU Moreno: el Festival Urbano más grande del Oeste | Canal 26
text: Dillom será la figura principal, también se presentarán Malena D’Alessio, Alika y otros artistas locales y emergentes. Desde las 15 horas en la Plaza Buján. Por Canal26 Jueves 19 de Septiembre de 2024 - 16:05 Este 21 de septiembre, el Municipio de Moreno trae la sexta edición del FU, el Festival Urbano de Moreno. Una iniciativa de la intendenta Mariel Fernández que se realiza desde el año 2021 con el objetivo de brindar a jóvenes, niñas y niños, espectáculos de primer nivel de forma libre y gratuita. El encuentro será en la Plaza Buján, ubicada en Ruta 7, km 35.5, a pocas cuadras de la estación de Moreno y Paso del Rey, desde las 15 horas. Esta edición contará con auspiciantes del sector privado: N1U -la billetera virtual del Banco Macro- y la marca KWT (Kuwait), quienes reducen los costos del Municipio para hacer el Festival. Además, el evento también cuenta con el apoyo del Instituto Cultural de la Provincia de Buenos Aires. La figura de esta edición será Dillom, y también se presentarán Malena D’Alessio y Alika, quienes tocarán juntas con un homenaje al primer disco de Actitud María Marta, “Acorralar la bestia”. El line-up lo completan Oney1; Clipper; Cerounno; Mary Jane, Dandara y otros artistas locales y artistas emergentes, en una convocatoria donde el FU reúne artistas urbanos locales con artistas consagrados, proporcionando una oportunidad única para los talentos morenenses que se dan a conocer y comparten escenario con músicos consolidados. Este espectáculo libre y gratuito se realiza con una gran puesta de escenario, luces y sonido, y una grilla que convoca a jóvenes de Moreno y de otros municipios, lo que logró que el FU Moreno se convierta en un evento de referencia del género urbano en toda la región. También habrá juegos y actividades recreativas gratuitas para disfrutar en familia, patio gastronómico y feria de emprendedoras y emprendedores locales. Te puede interesar: Más de 40 mil personas en el Festival Urbano de Moreno Luego de 29 años, vuelve a juntarse la primera formación del grupo de hip hop argentino “Actitud María Marta” con Malena D’Alessio y Alicia Dal Monte (Alika). Sus letras se destacaron por reflejar reclamos sociales vinculados a la lucha por los derechos humanos, la reivindicación de la cultura latinoamericana y la visibilización de sectores populares, interpretando los conflictos políticos de ese contexto y sumándose a la lucha por la transformación social. Malena y Alika fueron figuras fundamentales para la construcción del hip hop nacional, un movimiento cultural que no dejó de crecer desde aquel entonces. Tuvieron una activa participación en todos los festivales organizados por asociaciones de derechos humanos. En el aspecto musical hacen hip hop con fusión de música autóctona argentina y latinoamericana, con un rap de líricas fuertes y frontales. Una actitud de potencia, de lucha y de creatividad. El legado de Actitud María Marta tiene una vigencia permanente que se celebrará en el próximo Festival Urbano de Moreno. 1 El festival internacional Fauna Primavera presentó el line up 2024 con dos bandas argentinas 2 El 21 de septiembre vuelve FU Moreno: el Festival Urbano más grande del Oeste 3 Más de 40 mil personas en el Festival Urbano de Moreno 4 50 Cent, el rapero que sobrevivió a todo 5 "Paul McCartney está muerto" y otras teorías conspirativas sobre The Beatles Mantenete siempre informado

author: @ciudad_magazine
title: Nicole Neumann luce su pancita de embarazada junto a Manu Urcera, Allegra y Sienna Cubero en Punta del Este: la llamativa ausencia de Indiana | Ciudad Magazine
text: Nicole Neumann descansa en Punta del Este junto a sus hijas Allegra y Sienna y a su flamante marido, [Manu Urcera, con quien se casó ](https://www.ciudad.com.ar/espectaculos/2024/01/01/nicole-neumann-lucio-su-pancita-de-embarazada-en-el-festejo-por-ano-nuevo-2024-alla-vamos/)hace casi dos meses. [Luego de pasar Año Nuevo con su papá Fabián Cubero](https://www.ciudad.com.ar/espectaculos/2024/01/02/indiana-cubero-celebro-ano-nuevo-con-fabian-y-mica-viciconte-lejos-de-nicole-neumann-la-foto-que-se-filtro/), Indiana optó por no viajar a Uruguay con su mamá. La modelo y jurado de Los 8 escalones aprovechó para tomar sol en la playa mientras Urcera le tomaba fotografías. Luego, a Nicole se la vio mimosa con su esposo, a la vez que muy compinche con sus dos hijas. También podés leer... Las fotos de Nicole Neumann con Allegra y Sienna Cubero y Manu Urcera en Punta del Este Indiana celebró Año Nuevo con Fabián Cubero y Mica Viciconte Cuando parecía que el conflicto entre Indiana Cubero y su mamá Nicole Neumann había quedado en el pasado, se supo que la joven eligió pasar Año Nuevo con su papá, Fabián Cubero, y su novia, Mica Viciconte, en vez de con la modelo, su esposo, Manu Urcera, y sus dos hermanas, Sienna y Allegra. Pese a que en este último tiempo hubo un acercamiento, ya que Indiana se mostró contenta en el casamiento de su mamá -que espera un bebé con Manu- esta vez eligió recibir el 2024 con la familia de su papá. Así lo demostró Pochi en Gossipeame, su cuenta de Instagram.

author: Victoria Balderrama
title: Texas A&M University introduces AI in agriculture to young students
text:
CORPUS CHRISTI, Texas — The Department of Engineering at Texas A&M University Corpus Christi is introducing STEM to young students and teaching them how this field of study is changing with the times.
The Instituto de Cultura Hispánica hosted Texas A&M's Dr. Jose Vaca and his graduate research assistant for a free STEM summer workshop focusing on how to use AI in agriculture. It's part of a program called CODE-AG.
"All we're trying to make apparent is the challenges that are being faced, you know, like we're exponentially growing as a population, so of course we need more food. How do we sustainably get that food? These are solutions for that," graduate research assistant, Chris Salazar said.
This is the second summer workshop hosted by the Instituto de Cultura Hispánica. Texas A&M University would like to offer other opportunities to learn about CODE-AG.

author: @keycnewsnow
title: FIRST ALERT: Major winter storm to bring heavy snow, strong wind
text: FIRST ALERT: Major winter storm to bring heavy snow, strong wind It is looking more and more likely that a major winter storm will impact much of Minnesota and northern Iowa late this weekend into early next week. A [Winter Storm Watch](https://www.keyc.com/weather/alerts/) is now in effect for much of southern and central Minnesota from Sunday morning through Monday. Snow is expected to start Saturday night, becoming heavy from Sunday through to Monday night. Snow will transition to rain for a period on Monday, before switching back to snow and continuing through Monday night and possibly through much of Tuesday. As of now, it appears that we could get at least 6 inches of snow with the potential for more. There will likely be places that get a foot or more of snow, but those areas will depend on where the storm develops and tracks and rain vs. snow. Those details will become more clear in the next 24 hours or so. In addition to heavy snow, strong wind gusts of 30 to 40 mph will create blowing snow through the duration of this system. This will be a major winter storm that has a significant impact on travel from late Saturday night through much of Tuesday. There will be heavy snow, blowing snow, ice, and rain. Stay tuned… The weather team is watching this storm closely and will have updates as it develops. These are the important things you need to know right now: - Snow will develop Saturday night with heavy snow and blowing snow likely Sunday, Monday into Tuesday. There will be periods where snow transitions to rain. - Travel will likely be difficult, even impossible, from Sunday morning through Monday and into Tuesday. - In Mankato, 6 inches of snow is likely with the possibility of more depending on the storm track and rain vs. snow. - Because this is a warmer system, snow will be wet, heavy, and difficult to move. Some refer to this as “heart attack snow.” Don’t overdo it when shoveling. What you can do: - Be weather aware. Check the weather, and check it often because there will be changes to the forecast as this system develops. - If you have plans for travel from late Saturday night through Tuesday, it’s time to consider alternate plans. Get to where you want to be by Sunday morning because after that travel will be extremely difficult, if not impossible. - If you don’t have it yet, download the KEYC First Alert weather app. This is the best way to stay in touch with changes in developments and get the latest, instant alerts. We will also have the latest information on KEYC Weather Now, our 24/7 Weather Channel. You can find that over the air on channel 12.4 and streaming live at [KEYC.com](https://www.keyc.com/livestream/weather/)and on our news and weather apps. Here are the latest Watches, Warnings and Advisories: [Click here to download the KEYC News Now app or our KEYC First Alert weather app.](https://www.keyc.com/page/keyc-apps-for-ios-and-android-devices/) Copyright 2024 KEYC. All rights reserved.

author: Betsy Helfand; St Paul Pioneer Press Today
title: Pablo López on point as Twins earn series split with Rays
text:
Pablo López on point as Twins earn series split with Rays
Edouard Julien and Matt Wallner homered for the offense as the Twins split a four-game series with a 4-3 victory
ST. PETERSBURG, Fla. — Fresh off an ugly defensive game on Wednesday, and digesting tough injury news about Byron Buxton, who will be delayed in his return, and Max Kepler, who landed on the injured list, the Twins needed someone who could send them to Kansas City for a pivotal series against the Royals with some optimism.
And who better than Pablo López?
ADVERTISEMENT
López has looked every bit the ace in the second half of the season and on Thursday, he helped lead the Twins to a 4-3 win over the Tampa Bay Rays in the series finale at Tropicana Field.
“The team picked me up plenty of times in the first half when I wasn’t at my best or my sharpest,” López said. “It’s one of those things that you have to take it personal. We were down in the series and I knew I had an opportunity to come out here and do it for my guys, for my teammates.”
His 23⅓-scoreless innings streak was broken in the third inning when he allowed a two-run single to top prospect Junior Caminero, but the right-hander featured some of his best stuff as the Twins (76-64) salvaged a split of the four-game series.
López threw three different pitches above 98 mph, including one at 98.6 — the hardest pitch of his career. And his sweeper had a 70 percent whiff rate, accounting for seven of the 18 swinging strikes he racked up in the game.
ADVERTISEMENT
“As well as he’s been throwing the ball, this may have been as good of a day with some of his best stuff we’ve seen literally in two years,” bench coach Jayce Tingler said.
He gave up just one other run in the game, in the seventh inning when Yandy Díaz doubled to right. Matt Wallner tracked down the ball and his momentum took him tumbling over the outfield wall.
A lengthy rules review followed as the umpires figured out which base to place Díaz on. More than 10 minutes had passed, likely leading to the of López’s day as Griffin Jax was summoned to finish off the seventh inning.
ADVERTISEMENT
López said he was a little frustrated because one of the few fastballs he yanked in the game went for a double and then the delay took much longer than he expected.
“I was hoping to stay in the game after that, just to give me an opportunity to end on a better note by getting that last out,” López said. “But didn’t win that conversation. The best reliever in baseball came to get that last out.”
Though he didn’t get that final 21st out that he was hoping for, it was yet again another promising start from López when his team needed him the most.
And it comes as no surprise to those around him.
ADVERTISEMENT
“We know how hard he works. We know how good his stuff is. It felt like it was just a tick off (earlier this season). I think we knew this was coming,” catcher Ryan Jeffers said. “He’s our ace. He’s been our ace. He’s one of the top pitchers in all of baseball and he’s showing that now.”
The Twins’ top starter pitched with the lead for much of the day as Edouard Julien stepped up offensively and hit his first major league home run since April 25 in the second inning, a three-run shot off Rays (69-71) starter Taj Bradley on a pitch left over the heart of the plate. Wallner hit a solo homer an inning later for a 4-0 lead the Rays were unable to overcome.
With the split, the injury-depleted Twins now travel to Kansas City, to face the Royals, on whom they have a half game advantage in the American League Central. Both teams are currently positioned to win a Wild Card berth.
ADVERTISEMENT
“We all have a job to try to help the team win,” Julien said. “If everybody does that, I think we’re going to win some games. It (doesn’t) matter who it is. It’s the next man up.”
_________________________________________________

author: Arturo Meléndez
title: Onda tropical 30 provocará lluvias muy fuertes a intensas en 4 estados
text: La Comisión Nacional del Agua (Conagua) advirtió que para este viernes 1 de noviembre la interacción entre diferentes fenómenos hidrometeorológicos provocará lluvias puntuales intensas en un estado y muy fuertes en otros tres. A través de su informe diario, la dependencia advirtió que las fuertes lluvias serán provocadas por la interacción entre la onda tropical 30 con un canal de baja presión sobre el oriente y sureste del país, mientras que el frente frío 6 dejará de afectar al territorio nacional. De esta forma, se esperan lluvias intensas en: Banca móvil Falla en HSBC HOY 1 de noviembre ¿Qué pasó? - Chiapas Asimismo, se prevén intervalos de chubascos con lluvias puntuales muy fuertes en: - Oaxaca - Veracruz - Tabasco Lluvias puntuales fuertes en: - Coahuila - Nuevo León - Tamaulipas - San Luis Potosí - Guerrero - Puebla - Campeche También, se prevén solamente chubascos en: - Chihuahua - Querétaro - Hidalgo - Estado de México - Ciudad de México - Tlaxcala - Morelos - Michoacán - Yucatán - Quintana Roo Y lluvias aisladas en: - Guanajuato En el mismo sentido, la [Conagua](https://www.razon.com.mx/mexico/2024/10/29/onda-tropical-29-provocara-lluvias-fuertes-en-7-estados/) advirtió que, a causa de los mismos fenómenos hidrometeorológicos, se prevén fuertes rachas de viento, particularmente de 60 a 70 kilómetros por hora en: - Coahuila - Nuevo León - Tamaulipas Así como rachas de 40 a 60 kilómetros por hora en: - Campeche - Yucatán - Quintana Roo - Con posibles tolvaneras: - Baja California - Baja California Sur - Sonora - Chihuahua - Durango - Sinaloa - San Luis Potosí - Zacatecas A causa de esto, la Conagua advirtió que “las lluvias fuertes a torrenciales podrían ocasionar encharcamientos, inundaciones y deslaves, así como incremento en los niveles de ríos y arroyos. Las fuertes rachas de viento podrían derribar árboles y anuncios publicitarios”, por lo cual urgió a tomar precauciones. Baja la temperatura en estos estados Por otro lado, la Conagua advirtió que para este martes 29 de octubre se prevé frío en algunos estados, particularmente se registrarán temperaturas mínimas de -5 a -10 grados Celsius en: - Zonas montañosas de California; - Chihuahua; - Durango Así como mínimas de -5 a 0 grados Celsius en: - Zonas montañosas de Sonora y - Zacatecas Así como temperaturas mínimas de 0 a 5 grados Celsius en: - Zonas montañosas de Aguascalientes - Jalisco - Michoacán - Estado de México - Hidalgo - Tlaxcala - Puebla [Únete a nuestro canal de WhatsApp](https://Onda tropical 30 provocará lluvias muy fuertes a intensas en 4 estados). En La Razón enviamos a tu celular lo más importante México y el Mundo, recuerda que una persona informada siempre tiene La Razón. am

author: Susan Mwenesi
title: Witchdoctor Storms Church to Take Back Juju He Gave Pastor For His Ministry, Video Trends
text: Witchdoctor Storms Church to Take Back Juju He Gave Pastor For His Ministry, Video Trends - A video of a traditional doctor and his associates retrieving a charm they gave a pastor has gone viral - Not even attempts by a woman who tried to reason with them to stop what they were doing yielded results - People who saw the video remained divided in their opinion, with many saying the fetish priest and the men want to disgrace the pastor Social media has been thrown into a frenzy after a fetish priest in and his associates stormed a church premise to retrieve a charm they gave a pastor to use for his ministry. According to the post on X page of @eddie_wrt, the incident happened at the church premises of Vision Power Ministry at Amamole in Accra on February 22, 2024. The viral video showed the moment the associates of the fetish priest were digging the church's frontage in an attempt to retrieve the charm they gave to they gave the man of God. As they continued with the act, a middle-aged woman confronted them and tried to reason with them to stop, but they refused and continued until they finally retrieved an item wrapped in a polythene bag believed to be the charm they were looking for. PAY ATTENTION: Have a story to tell? Need expert advice? Feel free to reach out to us through askanexpert@tuko.co.ke. Watch the video Ghanaians share diverse opinions on the video Netizens who thronged the comment section of the video shared diverse opinions, with some saying the so-called charm may have been planted there to disgrace the pastor. [@moniphase](https://twitter.com/moniphase) reacted: If it’s true ..why is the charm they claim they planted there was not dirty in mud?What are they to gain with this planing and plotting @kwaku_piccaso indicated: Yall believe this? cant yall see they want to disgrace the pastor? The pastor needs bodyguards to guard the church auditorium i think another pastor plotted this adwuma adi nu Viral Kikuyu Pastor Defends Himself after Bizzare Video Praying for Woman, Claims He Was Helping Her @MullingsJane commented: Wow this rubbish why Ghana church is bringing their self-low like this Pastor Mackenzie, other pastors who caused stir in 2023 In 2023, Pastor [Paul Mackenzie](https://www.tuko.co.ke/tags/paul-mackenzie/) was the face of controversy; [hundreds of deaths were reported](https://www.tuko.co.ke/people/532755-pastor-mackenzie-preachers-hit-headlines-2023/) from his Good News International church. Jesus of Tongaren caused a craze for a while with his claim that he was the real son of God covered in the Christian [Bible](https://www.tuko.co.ke/facts-lifehacks/guides/493316-the-complete-list-books-bible-authors/). [Pastor Ezekiel](https://www.tuko.co.ke/tags/pastor-ezekiel/) divided opinions as he got linked with the Shakahola massacre masterminded by Mackenzie. PAY ATTENTION: check out news exactly for YOU ➡️ click on [“Recommended for you”](https://www.tuko.co.ke/recommended/) and enjoy!
